thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CyrusOne Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.84

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CyrusOne Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.84
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - CyrusOne Inc:
* CYRUSONE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 EARNINGS
* Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.84 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 31 PERCENT TO $180.5 MILLION * SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUE $810 MILLION - 825 MILLION
* SEES 2018 NORMALIZED FFO PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE $3.18 - $3.28
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $850 MILLION - 900 MILLION
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $182.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $3.38 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $797.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
